product_name: The North Face Circle Logo Reaxion T-Shirt - Boys' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Tireless young explorers will love the Circle Logo Reaxion boy's T-shirt from The North Face. Soft, breathable performance fabric stays comfy even after a long day on the trail. Lightweight, breathable VaporWick(R) polyester fabric wicks moisture away from skin and dries quickly. Built-in UPF 15 sun protection shields skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Coseout.
